NA NYID SNANG BA

MA DANG

SEMS DPA' LAN CIG ZHIG ,CES PA NI DPAL RDO RJE SEMS DPA'

LAN CIG TZAM DRAN PA YANG PHAN YON CHEN POR BSTAN PA STE, MING
YANG YONGS SU 'DZIN PA SPANG, ,ZHES PA NI, DE'I MTSAN LAN CIG
TZAM RJOD PAR BYED PA'O, 'DI NI SRUNG BA CHEN PO STE, ,ZHES PA
NI, DE LTAR BYA BA 'DI NI SRUNG BA RNAMS KYI NANG NA CHE BAR GYUR
BAS SO, ,NGES PAR

'GRUB STE SKAD CIG GIS, ,ZHES PA NI, SKAD CIG GIS SRUNG BAR MDZAD
PA'I BYIN RLABS NGES PAR GSOL BAR MDZAD PA STE, DNGOS GRUB THOB
PAR BYED PA LA NI MI SBYOR ZHES BYA'O, ,DE BAS NA LHA'I RNAL
'BYOR LA GNAS SHING SRUNG BA'I BSAM PA DANG LDAN PA LTA CI SMROS
KYI, CHUNG DU NA

GYI GZHAN RNAMS KYIS NI DE LTAR MA YIN NAM ZHE NA, SMRAS PA, DPAL
RDO RJE SEMS DPA' NI YE SHES SEMS DPA' RNAMS KYI DANG PO STE,
RGYUD

SEMS DPA' GZHAN PA RNAMS KYIS KYANG DE BZHIN DU 'GRUB PAR 'GYUR
NGES PAS NA GANG LA DAD PA'I SEMS DPA' RNAMS LA DMIGS
